item.title: SegBook: A Simple Baseline and Cookbook for Volumetric Medical Image Segmentation
item.description: SegBook: a large-scale benchmark, reveals that fine-tuning full-body CT pre-trained models significantly improves performance on various downstream medical image segmentation tasks, particularly for s…

item.title: RedPajama: an Open Dataset for Training Large Language Models
item.description: RedPajama, two massive open-source datasets, are released for training LLMs, improving transparency and facilitating the development of high-performing open-source models.
